hero.title: Discover Luxury Living at Durra Taibah
hero.description: Experience exceptional luxury and comfort in our carefully designed hotels, crafted to exceed your expectations.

AboutSection.title: About Us
AboutSection.subtitle: One place that combines luxury and high-end hospitality
AboutSection.description: Durra Taibah is not just a collection of hotels, but an experience that combines authentic Arabic traditions with the highest standards of modern hospitality. We strive to provide an unforgettable experience for our guests in every stay.

OurBranches.our_branches_description: Experience the magic of modern hospitality in multiple locations

ContactUsSection.contact_des: Send us your message, and we’ll be happy to respond.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: We are here to serve you and answer all your inquiries! Whether you need help with booking or have any questions about our services.
contactUs.contact_form_desc: If you have any inquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us through the following form, and we will respond to you as soon as possible.
contactUs.contact_info_desc: Contact us by phone or email, or visit us using the map below. Follow us on social media to stay updated with the latest blogs and offers.
